ComicInfo.Title: Long Day's Journey; The Endless Line
ComicInfo.Summary:
Long Day's Journey: At the House of Mystery, Constantine and other magic-based heroes seek a way to turn vampires back into living beings, but they are confronted by Jason Blood and a group of magical heroes turned into vampires who are determined to stop Constantine's group. Oliver strikes out on his own mission, while Dinah helps Barbara free Harley so they can go back to Gotham and strike at Nightwing.
The Endless Line: Neal Adams discusses his viewpoint on using new ideas and exercising his imagination, while many of the characters whom he contributed his talents to line up to thank him.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 22:13:00. [CVDB939719] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:48:55. [Issue ID 2422121]
